backend/main.mo: Actor storing contact form submissions in a Map with submission, retrieval, and sorted listing functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features, their files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend React components, pages, and data files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment checklist covering build verification, UI checks, routing, content validation, and production identifier requirements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, root mount element, and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with root layout and routes for all pages including five blog article routes.
frontend/src/components/blog/ArticleSide: Two‑column article layout component with a sticky image card and flexible content positioning.
frontend/src/components/common/Container: Reusable layout container applying responsive padding and max‑width.
frontend/src/components/common/GradientB: Structural wrapper component providing spacing without applying gradients.
Card component supporting icons, titles, descriptions, and customizable text classes.
frontend/src/components/common/MotionGra: Empty placeholder file for a motion graphic background component.
frontend/src/components/common/OceanAnim: Empty placeholder file for an ocean animated background component.
frontend/src/components/common/ProfilePo: Portrait component with gradient border, shadow, and responsive size options.
frontend/src/components/common/RightSide: Empty placeholder file for a right‑side portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionCo: Empty placeholder file for a corner portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionMe: Empty placeholder file for a medium section portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/ShareSite: Component showing the site URL with copy‑to‑clipboard and external link actions.
frontend/src/components/common/StaticWat: Component rendering static waterfall background and overlay layers.
frontend/src/components/common/Waterfall: Empty placeholder file for a video background component.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Implements a contact form with validation, controlled inputs, and submission via a custom hook with status handling.
frontend/src/components/contact/SubmitSt: Displays success or error alerts after contact form submission.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders a hero banner with name, roles, description, and CTA buttons for portfolio and contact.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides responsive site navigation with active link highlighting and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays footer branding, navigation links, contact prompt, and copyright info.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the site with header, footer, background, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Renders tab-based filters for selecting project categories.
Shows a grid of project cards with titles, descriptions, tools, and external links.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillCate: Displays a skill category card with skill meters for each listed skill.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillMete: Shows an individual skill name with a percentage progress bar.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillsDet: Renders detailed skill sections with images, descriptions, and key areas.
frontend/src/data/blogArticles.ts: Defines the BlogArticle interface and provides an array of detailed blog article objects with structured intro, sections, and conclusions.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Declares the Project interface and exports a list of project entries describing work across legal, business, marketing, design, video, and web categories.
frontend/src/data/skillsDetails.ts: Defines SkillDetail and exports categorized skill descriptions with images for legal, marketing, design, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that tracks the user's system reduced-motion preference using a media query.
Mutation hook that submits contact form data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, waterfall background styles, gradient text, and typography overrides.
frontend/src/lib/assetPaths.ts: Utility functions for normalizing asset paths and providing a fallback image path.
frontend/src/lib/emailValidation.ts: Simple email validation using a basic regex pattern.
frontend/src/lib/portrait.ts: Defines the portrait image source with URL encoding and a shared alt text string.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides a function to set document title and update meta and Open Graph tags dynamically.
frontend/src/lib/siteUrl.ts: Computes a canonical site URL based on window origin and the first path segment.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO setup, portrait, biography, and highlight sections.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogDigitalMarke: Renders the digital marketing article page, loading article data, setting SEO, handling image fallback, and displaying content in a side-by-side layout.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogGraphicDesig: Renders the graphic design article page with SEO setup, image fallback, and a side-by-side layout with the image on the right.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogLawLegalArti: Displays the law and legal article page, including SEO configuration, image handling, and structured article content.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogVideoEditing: Provides the video editing article page, managing SEO, image fallback, and rendering intro and sections in a side-by-side layout.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogWebDesignDev: Renders the web design and development article page with SEO setup, image handling, and right-positioned image content layout.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog articles with SEO setup, image fallback handling, and routing per article.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact form, contact info, and sets SEO for the Contact page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Sets SEO for the home page and renders the hero section.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Provides a portfolio view with filters, project grid, skills section, and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists available services with icons, descriptions, and includes SEO configuration.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Renders a skills overview section and configures SEO for the page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, typography, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, required theme/background changes, known issues, and architectural notes for the portfolio site.
